entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Temperature rising to minus 7 by morning.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy overnight. Fog patches developing after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 7 by morning. Wind chill minus 16 this evening and minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 4:26 PM CST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of freezing rain. High minus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of freezing rain late in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light near noon. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:26 PM CST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow or freezing rain. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of freezing rain in the evening. Snow beginning late in the evening. Fog patches developing in the evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 7 in the evening and minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 4:26 PM CST Friday 13 January 2023
